articles.title: Spotless giraffe, thought to be only one in world, born at Tennessee zoo - The Guardian
articles.description: Brights zoo hopes publicity around unnamed female, who lacks distinctive patches, will draw attention to plight of giraffes in wild
articles.content: One of the rarest sights in the animal kingdom has appeared in the unlikely setting of a Tennessee zoo, which has hosted the birth of what is thought to be the worlds only singularly colored giraffe.… [+1627 chars]
